tooltip: Select Ciela as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Ciela focuses on the healing rate and longevity of Fairies.
Allows you to summon Ciela, a tiny hero that can be attached to other units and Heroes.
Fairy Droves now have a small chance to respawn each time one is slain.
HP of all units is increased by 10%.
Regeneration Rate of all Fairy units is slightly increased.
